sources.title: Ninja Terminator
sources.description: Title: Ninja Terminator Summary: Three martial-arts students search for the Golden Ninja Warrior, a statue reputed to have magic powers. Directed by: Godfrey Ho Actors: Production Company: IFD Films and Arts Release Date: January 1986 (West Germany) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 Three martial-arts students search for the Golden Ninja Warrior, a statue reputed to have magic powers.

metadata.Plot: Three martial-arts students search for the Golden Ninja Warrior, a statue reputed to have magic powers.
metadata.Writer: AAV Creative Unit, Godfrey Ho, Warren See
metadata.Actors: Richard Harrison, Jeong-lee Hwang, Jonathan Wattis
